ComicInfo.Title: Prog 2252
ComicInfo.Summary:
*BORAG THUNGG, EARTHLETS – Prog 2252 is OUT NOW!* Welcome to your latest salvo of Thrilltastic zarjazness courtesy of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic as our autumn attack gathers pace — inside you’ll find non-stop cosmic action and adventure from Judge Dredd, The Out, Pandora Perfect, Scarlet Traces and The Diaboliks, guaranteed as ever to rewire your cranial circuits.
This awesome issue is joined on the shelves this week by a new special from the Treasury of British Comics stable — the Monster Fun Halloween Spooktacular, which features new takes on the title’s classic characters by the current generation of creators. Thus within its forty-eight pages you’ll find Cavan Scott and John Lucas on Frankie Stein, Alec Worley and Tiernen Trevallion on Kid Kong, Lizzie Boyle and Abigail Bulmer on Gums, and many, many more.
Pass it to the little monsters in your life, and it’ll keep them entertained for hours! But that’s not all — it heralds the start of the
next publishing venture from Rebellion, namely a bi-monthly Monster Fun ongoing anthology title starting in spring 2022.
Head over to monsterfun.co.uk for all the info and subscription details, humes!
Cover: Cliff Robinson - Dylan Teague
Droid Life (Cat Sullivan) Judge Dredd - The Hard Way (Part 3) (Rob Williams - Arthur Wyatt - Jake Lynch) The Diaboliks - Arrivederci Roma (Part Three) (Gordon Rennie - Antonio Fuso) Scarlet Traces - Storm Front (Part 3) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli) Pandora Perfect - "Mystery Moon" (Part Three) (Roger Langridge - Brett Parson) The Out - Book Two (Part Three) (Dan Abnett - Mark Harrison)
